componentType.description: starts external software applications via path and filename (.exe)

inputPort.description: File name of executable file which shall be started

eventListenerPort.description: an incoming event launches the application
an incoming event closes a launched application

property.name: autoLaunch
property.description: Launch the default application immediately at model startup

property.name: autoClose
property.description: if true, a launched application is closed when the model is stopped or switched

property.name: onlyByEvent
property.description: if true, an incoming filename at the input port is not lauched before the launchNow event is triggered
